segments.text: I'm going for a walk , Yi-jun . I need some time to myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you want to go to the visiting hours ? This sheet says they are tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just can't right now . Everyone will be talking about Taylor and ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ... and maybe that's what we both need .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need to come to grips with his death first . And I also need to prepare a eulogy in case I'm asked to speak tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , but don't forget I'm here for you , and I know how you feel . It's my loss , too .
segments.speaker: S2
